venue.address_1: 100 Milk Street Entrance (Ten PO Sq Bldg)
venue.name: Exemplar Law Partners, LLC

item.description:
Join the Revolve Nation Community for this informative Legal Seminar, a part of the Legal Seminar Series for Entrepreneurs: The ABC's of Legal Issues for Start-Up Companies. Lead by experienced entrepreneurial attorneys, this series is perfect for young, growth-oriented companies who want to know the key points of various legal issues for start-up companies. Snacks and beverages provided, and networking following the seminar.

Where: Exemplar (Revolve) Offices
100 Milk Street (Side entrance to Ten PO Sq. Bldg)
Boston, MA 02109

When: Mar 10, 2010 6pm-8pm + Networking afterwards

How Much: $5.00 in Advance, $8.00 at the door
(If you plan to pay at the door, email akavanah@exemplarlaw.com to RSVP)

About the Revolve Nation: Revolve Nation is a non-profit organization for entrepreneurs by entrepreneurs. The Boston Revolve Nation is the Largest Entrepreneurs Community in the City of Boston

AGENDA:

Learn the basics of:

1) Entity Types

LLCs, Partnerships, C-Corpoations, S-Corporations, Non-Profits

Ownership Structures, Agreements, etc.

Disagreements and disputes

2) Contracts

What contracts you need and why you need them

Common Pitfalls in Contracts

3) Intellectual Property

Trademark Basics

Patent Basics

Copyright Basics

Q&A


PRESENTATION: Entrepreneur Attorney Christopher Marston, Esq. of Exemplar Law / Revolve Law will present this engaging information.

SPONSORS (Space and Food/Drinks):

Revolve: "Accelerate the Revolution" -- Revolve is the first of its kind combination of a business law firm, business strategy and execution firm, and business capital/investment bank focused exclusively on accelerating the growth of companies from start-up to exit event. Visit US!

Exemplar Companies: Exemplar started as the first business law firm in the nation to abandon hourly billing in favor of a fixed-price model. Exemplar is an innovative professional services firm including the disciplines of law and business and committed to the growth of mid-market companies and serving the capital community.








_____________________________________________________
item.name: LEGAL SERIES: The ABCs of Legal Issues for Start-Up Companies
